## Conditional Statements

Task 1
```{r}
pm2_5 <- 170

if(pm2_5<100){
  print("Low to moderate risk")
}else if (100 <= pm2_5 & pm2_5 < 150){
  print("Unhealthy for sensitive groups")
}else if (pm2_5 >= 150) {
  print("Health risk present")
}
```

Task 2
```{r}
species <- "blue whale shark"

if(stringr::str_detect(species, pattern = "whale")) {
  print("You found a whale!")
}
```

Task 3
```{r}
base_burrito <- 6.50
main_ingredient <-  "chicken"

switch(main_ingredient,
       "veggie" = print(base_burrito),
       "chicken" = print(base_burrito + 3),
       "steak" = print(base_burrito + 3.25))

```

## For Loops

Task 4
```{r}
fish <- c(8,10,12,23)

for(i in 1:length(fish)){
  fish_prop <- fish[i]/sum(fish)
  print(fish_prop)
}
```
Task 5
```{r}
for(i in 1:length(month.name)){
  print(paste(month.name[i],"is month", i))
}
```
